import React, { useState } from 'react' import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../css/home.css' import Navbar from '../components/navbar.js' import Chat from './chat.js' import socket from './connect.js' import Room from './room.js' import ListUsers from './listUser.js' function Home(history){ const nameLog = history.location.state.login const time = new Date().toLocaleString() console.log("time = " + time) const [chat, setChat] = useState({ message: '', name: nameLog, type:'send', room:'', }) const [actualRoom, setActualRoom] = useState([]) socket.on('actualRoom', room => { setActualRoom(room) }) const onMessageSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(actualRoom) const { name, message, type } = chat socket.emit('message', { name, message, type, actualRoom}) setChat({ message: '', name, type , actualRoom}) } const onTextChange = e => { setChat({ ...chat, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return(
"{chat.name}" say : onTextChange(e)}/>

List connected
) } export default Home
